channel.title: [DEAD TOPIC] My Old IBM ThinkPad Laptop... [DO NOT POST]
channel.description:
[s]Hello Moparscapians...
About a year ago from last november I acquired an old IBM ThinkPad T22 laptop. I've had it for over a year now and it has started acting strange. It all started yesterday when I was trying to update iTunes and it shut off completely without even the charge light on. It has shut off a lot since then but only when I was really using it. Can anyone speculate what the problem might be? I really need to get a new computer (I know...) but not at this time. Also, whenever I try to connect my IPhone to try and sync it just shuts off as well. I don't know... probably not anything to talk about. Might as well let this topic die along with my laptop...
-Ghostly150[/s]

item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

Does it freeze up or slow down and then shut off? Or just shut off?
